channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Gaming Laptops (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We tested the latest and greatest gaming laptops—from portable machines to an 18-inch gargantuan—so you can level up your game anywhere.

item.title: OpenAI’s $6.5B funding round may close as soon as next week
item.description: The WSJ reports that OpenAI's next funding round, worth around $6.5 billion, could close as soon as the first week in October. © 2024 TechCrunch. All ...

item.title: Wordy’s new app helps you learn vocabulary while watching movies and TV shows
item.description: Wordy is a new iOS app that offers a unique way to learning English. The app automatically translates and defines unknown words while you watch your f...

item.title: Scientists Figured Out How to Recycle Plastic by Vaporizing It
item.description: A new technique could prevent tons of waste in the future—if it can scale.

item.title: Solar Sails and Comet Tails: How Sunlight Pushes Stuff Around
item.description: It seems crazy, but light actually exerts a physical force on objects. It could power a new generation of spacecraft for deep-space missions.

item.title: Trump’s $100,000 Watches Are the Most Tragic Celebrity Watch Yet
item.description: Former president Donald Trump wants you to buy gaudy, overpriced timepieces “made for those who combine boldness and elegance.” He got one part right.

item.title: US government charges three Iranian hackers with Trump campaign hack
item.description: Three Iranian hackers working for the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) targeted the Trump campaign in an attempted hack-and-leak operation, ac...

item.title: Bret Taylor of Sierra joins TechCrunch Disrupt 2024
item.description: We’re thrilled to welcome Bret Taylor to TechCrunch Disrupt 2024. As the former co-CEO of Salesforce, founder of Quip, former CTO of Facebook, the co-...

item.title: Amazon dodges antitrust scrutiny in UK over Anthropic investment
item.description: The U.K.s' antitrust authority has concluded that Amazon's partnership and equity investment in AI startup Anthropic can't be investigated under curre...

item.title: The Best Dyson Vacuums We've Tested and Reviewed: V15, V12, and More
item.description: Feeling the pull of a clean machine? We’ll help you make sense of Dyson’s whirlwind vacuum lineup.
